name: Paracetamol
description: Effective for mild to moderate pain relief and to reduce fever.

name: Ibuprofen
description: Relieves pain, reduces inflammation, and lowers fever.

name: Aspirin
description: Effective for pain relief, reducing inflammation, and preventing heart attacks and strokes.

name: Acetaminophen
description: Used to treat mild to moderate pain and to reduce fever.

name: Loratadine
description: Non-drowsy antihistamine used for relieving symptoms of hay fever and other allergic conditions.

name: Cetirizine
description: Antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms such as watery eyes, runny nose, itching eyes/nose, and sneezing.

name: Diphenhydramine
description: Antihistamine used to relieve symptoms of allergy, hay fever, and the common cold.

name: Omeprazole
description: Proton pump inhibitor used to treat gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), peptic ulcer disease, and Zollinger-Ellison syndrome.

name: Ranitidine
description: Histamine-2 blocker used to treat and prevent ulcers in the stomach and intestines.

name: Simethicone
description: Antiflatulent used to relieve symptoms of gas, bloating, and discomfort caused by gas.

name: Fexofenadine
description: Antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms such as watery eyes, runny nose, itching eyes/nose, and sneezing.

name: Montelukast
description: Leukotriene receptor antagonist used to prevent asthma and to relieve symptoms of seasonal allergies.

name: Lansoprazole
description: Proton pump inhibitor used to treat peptic ulcer disease, gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), and Zollinger-Ellison syndrome.

name: Cimetidine
description: Histamine-2 blocker used to treat and prevent ulcers in the stomach and intestines.

name: Famotidine
description: Histamine-2 blocker used to treat and prevent ulcers in the stomach and intestines.

name: Ondansetron
description: Serotonin 5-HT3 receptor antagonist used to prevent nausea and vomiting caused by chemotherapy, radiation therapy, and surgery.

name: Domperidone
description: Dopamine receptor antagonist used as a prokinetic agent to treat nausea and vomiting.

name: Metoclopramide
description: Dopamine receptor antagonist used as a prokinetic agent to treat nausea and vomiting.

name: Loperamide
description: Opioid receptor agonist used to decrease the frequency of diarrhea.

name: Bismuth Subsalicylate
description: Antacid and anti-diarrheal used to treat heartburn, indigestion, upset stomach, nausea, diarrhea, and other temporary discomforts of the stomach and gastrointestinal tract.
